Translations.Text: Ad ias lameo n Oebbi, ur peirit $uoes. Gedha s yiS! Ay Aalay, sennig wayen pcaraken
Issrusu d lmalayek s ooue si lameo iS, $ef win i S ihwan, deg imdanen iS: "Nedoet ar ur illi oebbi siwa Nek. Ihi, eezzbet iyI
Ixleq tamurt akked igenwan, s tidep. Ay Aalay sennig wayen pcaraken
Ixelq ed amdan si tiqqit; atan iu$al aS, d axuim n uuee
Ixelq awen d lmal, segsen iceiiiven ieman, aba$uo, u, segsen, teppeppem
D ccbaea nnwen mara ten id terrem, u mara ten teksem
Ppawin tiakkwmin nnwen ar tmurt ur teppawvem, siwa ma taapbem. Ih, Mass nnwen, war ccekk, d Umain, d Aenin
Iaewdiwen, iserdyan, i$wyal, i rrekba nnwen akked ccbaea. Ixelleq ayen ur tessinem
D Oebbi i Ippawin d ubrid. Ff$en segs. Ma ihwa yaS, a kwen Inhu meooa
D Neppa i wen d Isse$layen aman seg igenni. Segsen tissit nnwen, segsen ttjuo i itepp lmal
Isskar awen d yissen nnaama, azemmur, tizdayin, tieuoin, akked yal ppemoa. Deg waya, s tidep, assekni i ugdud ipxemmimen
Inub awen d s yiv akked wass, iiij akked waggur. Itran ppemnuben s lameo iS. Deg waya, s tidep, issekniyen i ugdud ifehmen
I wen d Ixleq di tmurt, degs initen imgarraden. Deg waya, s tidep, assekni i ugdud ismektayen
D Neppa i Inuben s yill, iwakken a pteppem, segs, aksum aleqqaq, a d teksem, segs, rreue i teppeqqnem. A pwaliv lbabuo ipcerrig it, iwakken a pnadim si lfevl iS, amar a ppesnemmrem
Issers idurar $ef tmurt, ur teppembwiwil yiswen; isaffen, iberdan, amar a ppepwanham
timuliwin: s yitran, nitni pwanhan

Lemmer a peesbem l$it n Oebbi, ur tezmirem. Ih, Oebbi, war ccekk, Ipsemmie, Ipeunu
Oebbi Ieoa ayen teffrem akked wayen teqqaoem
Wid u$uo pnujun, war Oebbi, ur illi wayen xelqen. D nitni i ipwaxelqen
D lmeggtin ur d imuddiren, ur eoin melmi ara ten id ssekren
Oebbi nnwen d Oebbi Yiwen. Wid ur numin ara s laxeot, d ulawen nnsen i iugin. U nitni pzzuxun
War ccekk, Oebbi Ieoa ayen teffren, akked wayen qqaoen. Neppa, s tidep, ur Ieemmel ara imzuxiyen
Ma nnan asen: "d acu id Issers Mass nnwen"? Qqaoen: "d timucuha imezwura
Ad bibben, ass n tnekra, tiaakkwmin nnsen, s pmam nnsent, akked wumur si taakkwmin n wid telfen, mebla ma faqen. Day macci dir it wayen bubben
Ih, undin p, wid i ten id izwaren. Oebbi Iaatad lebni nnsen, si llsas. I$li d ssqef fellasen. Iusa ten id uaaqeb seg wanda ur bnin
Sinna, ass n tnekra, a ten Idull, ad Yini: "anda ten icriken iW, i$ef temnamarem"? Nnan imawlan n tussna: "war ccekk, ddell akked ddens, assa, $ef ijehliyen
iwumi ddment lmalayek leowae, nitni densen iman nnsen". A d ssutren tifrat: "ur nexdim kra n tucmip". Xaii, Oebbi, s tidep, Ieoa ayen txeddmem
